item.title: The Spodcast Returns – #29: Pax East and the Anthem Blues
item.description: The Spodcast is finally back, this time as a live show! This episode, Alex discusses her Pax East experiences, and we weigh in on the ongoing Anthem revelations.

item.title: The Spodcast #27: Mooncrash, Battle Royale, and Earnestness
item.description:
The Spodcast returns as we try to rescue Chris from the moon, help him overcome his crippling Fortnite addiction, and discover how being part of the Yakuza is really quite heartwarming.

We’ve got a Discord now! Come hang out: https://discord.gg/mMupuCr

Show Notes:
0:26 – Prey: Mooncrash
11:57 – Fortnite
25:16 – Realm Royale
31:30 – Yakuza 0 and Earnestness in Games

item.title: Star Butts S1E3: Where No Man Has Gone Before
item.description:
Alex, Josh, and Mumbles got together to watch Star Trek, and you can watch along with this commentary track! Just queue up the episode on Netflix or your physical media of choice, and follow the instructions at the beginning of the commentary track to experience Spoiler Warning On Your Television. Because… well, CBS wouldn’t let us just upload the an entire episode of Star Trek to YouTube, now would they?

In this episode, we learn that ESP is real and the barrier at the edge of the galaxy will really make you want to wear silver contacts. Also, people go crazy with god powers again in a way that’s totally not at all like the last episode!

We’ve also got an RSS feed set up for future episodes. You can find that over on the sidebar, or directly here.

item.title: Star Butts S1E2: Charlie X
item.description:
Alex, Josh, and Mumbles got together to watch Star Trek, and you can watch along with this commentary track! Just queue up the episode on Netflix or your physical media of choice, and follow the instructions at the beginning of the commentary track to experience Spoiler Warning On Your Television. Because… well, CBS wouldn’t let us just upload the an entire episode of Star Trek to YouTube, now would they?

In this episode, the Enterprise takes aboard a strange but definitely not creepy supergod teenager named Charlie. Not “Charlie X,” just Charlie. Oh also Josh sings!

We’ve also got an RSS feed set up for future episodes. You can find that over on the sidebar, or directly here.

item.title: The Spodcast Live! #2
item.description:
The Spodcast Live is our monthly live version of the Spodcast, exclusively for our Patrons! If you’re interested in catching the next live version of the Spodcast, you can contribute to our Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/spoilerwarning ! Even $1 is a big help, and will get you access to the live show!

EDIT: MP3 and OGG versions have been added. Sorry for the delay.

item.title: Star Butts S1E1: The Man Trap
item.description:
Alex, Josh, and Mumbles got together to watch Star Trek, and you can watch along with this commentary track! Just queue up the episode on Netflix or your physical media of choice, and follow the instructions at the beginning of the commentary track to experience Spoiler Warning On Your Television. Because… well, CBS wouldn’t let us just upload the an entire episode of Star Trek to YouTube, now would they?

In this episode, we watch the first aired episode of the series, The Man Trap! Can the crew of the Enterprise unravel the salty secret of M113, or will they succumb to the dastardly heat lamps?

We’ve also got an RSS feed set up for future episodes. You can find that over on the sidebar, or directly here.

item.title: Star Butts 0x01: The Cage
item.description:
And now for something completely different!

Alex, Josh, and Mumbles got together to watch Star Trek, and you can watch along with this commentary track! Just queue up the episode on Netflix or your physical media of choice, and follow the instructions at the beginning of the commentary track to experience Spoiler Warning On Your Television. Because… well, CBS wouldn’t let us just upload the an entire episode of Star Trek to YouTube, now would they?

In this episode, we take a look at the original unaired pilot episode for the Original Series, with the always memorable Captain Pike! And First Officer… Number One! Uh, they didn’t actually name all of the characters. But hey, Spock’s in it…

We’ve also got an RSS feed set up for future episodes. You can find that over on the sidebar, or directly here.

item.title: The Spodcast Live! #1
item.description:
The Spodcast Live is our monthly live version of the Spodcast, exclusively for our Patrons! This is the archive of our first live episode, where we discuss plumbing, cars, Stretch Armstrong, 19th century firearm technology, and historiography! It’s a podcast about video games!

If you’re interested in catching the next live version of the Spodcast, you can contribute to our Patreon at https://www.patreon.com/spoilerwarning ! Even $1 is a big help, and will get you access to the live show!

item.title: Save vs. Death EP2: The HackMaster Snafu
item.description: Jacob joins us as we take a detour from D&D 2 into a frightening glimpse at a system succinctly described as “AD&D if you set out to make it more convoluted.” It was not a wise decision.

item.title: Save vs. Death EP1: Attack of the Soup Monsters
item.description:
This holiday season, it’s always good to remember what we’re thankful for. For example, that Dungeons and Dragons isn’t nearly as obtuse and inscrutable as it once was. And what better way to remind ourselves of that than to actually go back and try to play old D&D?

Welcome to Save vs. Death, the series where Josh and Rutskarn attempt to survive a playthrough of Dungeons and Dragons 2nd edition! THAC0! Two completely different ways to multi-class! No encounter tables!

Will any of our stalwart hosts make it out alive?
item.itunes:author: The Spodcast
item.itunes:summary:
This holiday season, it’s always good to remember what we’re thankful for. For example, that Dungeons and Dragons isn’t nearly as obtuse and inscrutable as it once was. And what better way to remind ourselves of that than to actually go back and try to play old D&D?
Welcome to Save vs. Death, the series where Josh and Rutskarn attempt to survive a playthrough of Dungeons and Dragons 2nd edition! THAC0! Two completely different ways to multi-class! No encounter tables!
Will any of our stalwart hosts make it out alive?
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast

item.itunes:summary:
Alex returns from vacation bringing tales of the exotic and mystical Amsterdam!
Show Notes: 0:32 – Alex in the Netherlands 23:55 – Alex and the Gambling Conference 34:50 – Halloween Horror Nights 38:33 – Mario + Rabids Kingdom Battle 52:14 – Mailbag 53:45 – What’s your favorite adaptation of games to another medium? 1:00:30 – MC Hawking – Quake Master https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aXLIzk_7KCE 1:03:18 – Guild Wars 2’s Horrible Advertising – https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Noh81HcovYY
item.dc:creator: The Spodcast

item.title: The Spodcast #12: TwitchCon, Dauntless, And Guild Wars 2
item.description:
Recording times didn’t work out quite the way we’d hoped this week, so everyone got to be just a little bit loopy in this episode of the Spodcast, where we discuss fast food, travel, the dark ages of Web 1.0, and–ever so occasionally–video games.

Show Notes:
1:08 – The Ancient Internet
5:16 – Fast Food or something
9:18 – TwitchCon
28:10 – Guild Wars 2
47:15 – Dauntless
52:47 – Mailbag
53:12 – What long-running franchise have you played the most games in?
1:03:43 – What are some of your favorite gaming protagonists?
item.itunes:author: The Spodcast

item.title: The Spodcast #11: Bad Habits, Proper Nouns, and the Historical Veracity of the Existence of Hel
item.description:
We play dress-up, forget everyone’s name, and Campster becomes very confused about the metaphysical concept of the underworld.

0:27 – GOG Pinata sale
9:20 – Glitch vs Spooky Noises
12:03 – Love Nikki-Dress UP Queen
17:39 – Hellblade: Senua’s Sacrifice
20:45 – Hellblade SPOILERS
31:07 – The Signal from Tolva and Sir, You Are Being Hunted
38:17 – Roundtable Topic: Have you ever imposed a rule on a game that diminished the experience for yourself?
53:10 – Mailbag: Which is your favorite daughter of Sad-Dads in games?

item.title: The Spodcast #10: Ketchup, Mayo, and Zombie Wolves
item.description:
It’s time for a laid back, late night Spodcast about condiments and unnaturally evil wolves.

0:42 – Splatfest
9:54 – Fortnite
21:00 – The Long Dark Story Mode
32:34 – Mailbag
33:08 – Dishonored 2, blink or far-reach?
35:04 – How do you feel about Kickstarter right now?
49:12 – Are you watching (or did you watch) EVO?

item.title: The Spodcast #8: Disney, Spider-Man, and Potato People
item.description:
Glitch, Josh, Mumbles and Chris put their heads together to find out if it’s even possible to talk about video games on this show.

0:22 – Disney Parks
09:25 – Wrestlers and Actors
30:10 – Spider-Man Homecoming
35:45 – Spider-Man Spoilers
1:06:50 – D23 Expo
1:27:50 – Mailbag
1:28:25 – How do you feel about Mass Effect being put on ice?
1:38:55 – Would you rather listen to Josh talk about Dark Souls or Paradox Games?
1:44:05 – What is your favorite Pokemon?

item.title: The Spodcast #7: VR, SNES Classic, and the Han Solo Blues
item.description:
With everyone on vacation, we’ve got a skeleton crew this week, but Glitch, Josh, and Campster manage to get together to talk about Nintendo, the current state of VR, the new Han Solo director, and more!

5:15 – Nintendo Switch travel impressions
18:00 – The Current State of VR
35:35 – Steam Sale
42:45 – SNES Classic
53:10 – Han Solo Director Troubles
1:08:10 – Mailbag
1:08:45 – Who would play you in the movie adaptation of Spoiler Warning?
1:14:25 – What do you think of the new XBox and do you have unfiltered wheat bear?
1:20:20 – What are your favorite game reviewers?
1:25:45 – Do you plan on watching the solar eclipse on the 21st of August?
item.itunes:author: The Spodcast

item.title: The Spodcast – RPG Sessions #1: Character Creation
item.description: Rutskarn’s been wanting to do a tabletop RPG with the Spoiler Warning cast for years, so in this special podcast episode, we create our characters. We’ll be doing more of these occasionally in the future, so let us know what you think!
item.itunes:author: The Spodcast
item.itunes:summary: Rutskarn’s been wanting to do a tabletop RPG with the Spoiler Warning cast for years, so in this special podcast episode, we create our characters. We’ll be doing more of these occasionally in the future, so let us know what you think!

item.title: The Spodcast #6: Electronic Entertainment Expo Extravaganza
item.description:
E3 2017 is over, so now it’s time to share our thoughts on this whole crazy thing.

3:35 – Electronic Arts
22:40 – Microsoft
43:45 – Josh takes a break so Duck Tales?
45:50 – Bethesda
50:15 – Devolver Digital, Intel, and the PC Gaming Show
54:10 – Ubisoft
1:09:10 – Sony
1:16:50 – Nintendo
1:26:10 – Mailbag: Rate console names from smartest to XBox One X

item.title: The Spodcast #5: Not E3, Bad Games, and Guardians of the Galaxy 2
item.description:
Recorded on the eve of E3, we instead talk about other conferences that weren’t E3. Also, Glitch returns to talk about Guardians of the Galaxy 2, we discuss the bad games we still enjoy, and more!

2:20 – We talk about not talking about E3
6:35 – Guardians of the Galaxy 2 (SPOILERS)
34:00 – Josh got a Switch somehow
40:05 – A tale of two Academic Conferences
54:10 – Enjoying Bad Games
1:13:45 – Mailbag
1:14 20 – Which games have you gotten really deep into because you enjoyed the mechanics so much?
1:29:35 – What do you think about politics in games?
item.itunes:author: The Spodcast

item.title: Spodcast #4: Switches, Steam and MUD Fights
item.description:
As we gear up for E3, we discuss the news of the Switch online service, Steam Direct, and rumors about another Life is Strange game. And then things get dirty as Rutskarn regales us with a cautionary tale about MUDs.

3:30 – We’ll be talking over the E3 press conferences! You can catch those at our Twitch Channel
11:05 – Nintendo unveils plans for the Switch online service
39:25 – Steam Direct fee and curation plans
53:50 – Life is Strange Prequel rumors
1:02:55 – Rutskarn rants about MUDs
item.itunes:author: The Spodcast

item.title: The Spodcast #3: Far Cry 5, Movie Madness, and Anime Tiddies
item.description:
Alex of http://firstpersonscholar.com joins us to talk about films, food, Far Cry, and... anime tiddies?


4:30 Far Cry 5

19:40 Lord of the Rings Animated Films

27:35 Guardians of the Galaxy 2

35:40 Logan (Spoilers)

46:35 John Wick 2

48:00 Colossal

51:05 Mailbag

52:25 What are some of your favorite food and drink pairings?

1:00:00 How do you feel about the Starcraft remaster?

1:07:50 Glitch talks about Majesty 2

1:11:40 How do you feel about Steam Direct and its paywall?

item.title: The Spodcast #2: Destiny 2, Prey, and Typhoid Burgers
item.description:
Wherein the episode goes up three hours late, we still don't have a website yet, but Glitch gets Pop-Tarts.


4:25 - Destiny 2 Reveal

17:05 - Square Enix parting ways with IO Interactive

25:20 - Prey

42:05 - Prey Story Spoilers

1:08:25 - Mailbag

1:08:35 - Chris, how is Pepsi Fire?

1:11:55 - Rank Fast Food Burgers from Worst to Best

1:24:45 - When do you think EA will shut down BioWare Montreal?

1:32:20 - Alan Wake and Expired Music Licenses

1:38:55 - What is your favorite recipe that uses alcohol as an ingredient?

1:44:00 - Glitch's wife made homemade Pop-Tarts and we're (mostly) all jealous. 


Featuring: "Off to Osaka" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

item.title: The Spoiler Warning Podcast #1
item.description:
It seems only appropriate for us to try one of these things.

This was a little later than intended, but migraines be damned, it's going up tonight!

2:30 - Spoiler Warning is leaving Twenty Sided. 

I didn't want to get too far into this on the podcast, but if you want to know more about the circumstances that led to the split, I wrote about it on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/posts/well-that-9299827

6:30 - Sleeping Dogs is getting a movie?

18:15 - Would Quantic Dream games be better or worse as films?

22:45 - E3 and bad trailers

31:05 - Prey

46:55 - PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS


Featuring: "Off to Osaka" Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/
item.itunes:author: The Diecast

It seems only appropriate for us to try one of these things. This was a little later than intended, but migraines be damned, it's going up tonight!

I didn't want to get too far into this on the podcast, but if you want to know more about the circumstances that led to the split, I wrote about it on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/posts/well-that-9299827 6:30 - Sleeping Dogs is getting a movie? 18:15 - Would Quantic Dream games be better or worse as films? 22:45 - E3 and bad trailers 31:05 - Prey 46:55 - PLAYERUNKNOWN'S BATTLEGROUNDS
